constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 24 (Monday, February 7, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. SCHRIER:
H.R. 6634.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I
[Page H1013]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

title: To amend title XXVIII of the Public Health Service Act to eliminate the sunset of authority to make certain appointments for the National Disaster Medical System, and for other purposes.
